Trustee_4_pre_3.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_3.content: Sofia Hernandez has proposed a resource allocation plan that was deemed untrustworthy due to her lack of prior reputation. As a result, her first attempt to secure investment has failed, which negatively impacts her trustworthiness and overall reputation as a trustee. Despite proposing a fair allocation of 60% to the investor, her one-time rejection contributes to a weakened reputation profile.

Investor_4_pre_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_4.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated a strategic and proactive approach by thoroughly reviewing the allocation plan proposed by my trustee. My focus on maximizing returns paid off as I received higher profits than expected, which reflects my negotiation skills and ability to select trustworthy partners. This positive outcome enhances my reputation as a savvy investor, showcasing my competence in navigating investments effectively and building reliable relationships.
